subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: The Australian MotoGP world champion Casey Stoner romped to his second win in a week at the Dutch Grand Prix in Amsterdam, while Spain’s Dani Pedrosa seized the overall lead from Valentino Rossi. Stoner, a runaway winner at Donington Park in Britain last Sunday, earned his third victory of the season. Pedrosa was second on a Honda, 11.310 seconds behind, to leapfrog Rossi in the overall standings.
